required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Expression of Th9 Cells and Poor/Non-responsiveness to Hepatitis B Vaccination
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of the Expression Level of Th9 Cells and IL-9 In Poor/Non-responsiveness to Hepatitis B Vaccination

brief_summary.textblock: An observational study will be performed in subjects aged 3-65 years old to describe the dynamic changes of cellular immunity after vaccination of hepatitis B vaccine, and to find out the expression levels of Th9 cells and IL9 in subjects with different response to the primary immunization (3 single -dose injunctions).

detailed_description.textblock: This study selected 74 volunteers which had the hepatitis B vaccine (immunization programs 0,1,6) , anti-HBs≤10mIU as the research subjects, and choose 20 volunteers which anti-HBs≥1000mIU as the control group, revaccination the groups according to the normal immunization programs, then the blood samples would be collected at 7th day, separate the PBMC and detect the expression levels of Th9 cells and IL9 by FCM, trying to find out the effects of Th9 and IL9 of non/poor -responsiveness subjects to hepatitis B.

primary_outcome.time_frame: blood sample of 7th day after each vaccination

arm_group.description: Recent serological testing result show HBsAg, HBeAg, anti-HBe, anti-HBc, HBV DNA and Pre-S1 should be negative. had vaccinated hepatitis B vaccine and the value of anti-HBs be zero.
Recent serological testing result show HBsAg, HBeAg, anti-HBe, anti-HBc, HBV DNA and Pre-S1 should be negative. had vaccinated hepatitis B vaccine and the value of anti-HBs≤5mIU/ml.
Recent serological testing result show HBsAg, HBeAg, anti-HBe, anti-HBc, HBV DNA and Pre-S1 should be negative. had vaccinated hepatitis B vaccine and the value of 5mIU≤anti-HBs≤10mIU
Recent serological testing result show HBsAg, HBeAg, anti-HBe, anti-HBc, HBV DNA and Pre-S1 should be negative. had vaccinated hepatitis B vaccine and the value of anti-HBs≥1000mIU.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- volunteer
- between 3-60 years old
- healthy
- have the history of vaccination of hepatitis B.
- Recent serological testing result show HBsAg, HBeAg, anti-HBe, anti-HBc, HBV DNA and Pre-S1 should be negative.
- informed consent
- not allergic to the component of the vaccine
Exclusion Criteria:

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
